content: canopy is a cushion or pillow cover featuring an all over slipped stitch texture in three colours an optional afterthought opening at the back allows to easily remove the cover and comes with a step by step video tutorial **sizes ** 1 2 square rectangle size 1 fits a 50 x 50 cm 19 ¾ x 19 ¾ cushion finished cover measurements length x circumference 45 x 85 cm 17 ¾ x 33 ½ size 2 fits a 50 x 30 cm cushion 19 ¾ x 11 ¾ finished cover measurements length x circumference 45 x 45 cm 17 ¾ x 17 ¾ the pattern provides instructions to achieve any shape and size **yarn ** you will need 3 colours of dk or worsted weight yarn in the following amounts mc 380 180 meters 415 200 yards cc1 300 140 meters 330 155 yards cc2 300 140 meters 330 155 yards the square sample was knit using woll butt cassia 125 m 137 yds / 50 g in 10316 mc 10323 cc1 and 10318 cc2 the rectangle sample was knit using lana grossa landlust alpaca merino 100 100 m 109 yds / 50 g in 324 mc 326 cc1 and 310 cc2 **needles ** main fabric 3 75 mm us 5 circular needles ribbing 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles or sizes required to get gauge **gauge ** 26 sts x 50 rnds per 10 cm 4 in texture stitch after blocking **notions ** tapestry needle and scissors scrap yarn stitch markers row counter recommended fastening method optional three buttons snap pressure buttons or zipper two spare needles for provisional cast-on three needle bind-off and afterthought opening **techniques used ** cover worked as a tube in the round with optional opening at the back provisional cast-on 3 colour mosaic like texture pattern with slipped and purl stitches three needle bind-off to close top and bottom of the cover optional afterthought back opening video tutorial included picking up stitches half twisted ribbing mattress seam to sew down the sides of the ribbed edges pattern includes charted and written instructions ------------------------------------------------- canopy est une housse de coussin avec un motif texturé tricolore de mailles glissées une ouverture facultative après-coup sur l arrière permet d enlever facilement la housse et est présentée étape par étape avec un tutoriel vidéo **tailles ** 1 2 carré rectangle la taille 1 est pour un coussin de 50 x 50 cm mesures de la housse longueur x circonférence 45 x 85 cm la taille 2 est pour un coussin de 50 x 30 cm mesures de la housse longueur x circonférence 45 x 45 cm le patron contient des instructions pour obtenir n importe quelle forme et taille **laine ** vous aurez besoin de 3 couleurs de fil d épaisseur dk ou worsted avec le métrage suivant cp 380 180 mètres cc1 300 140 mètres cc2 300 140 mètres le modèle carré est tricoté avec la woll butt cassia 125 m / 50 g coloris 10316
